name: Odoo Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Odoo Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Odoo API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Odoo API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact

customResource.name: customResource
customResource.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
customResource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Resource Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new note
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many notes

fieldsToCreateOrUpdate.name: fieldsToCreateOrUpdate
fieldsToCreateOrUpdate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}

customResourceId.name: customResourceId
customResourceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Resource ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fieldsList (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

filterRequest.name: filterRequest
filterRequest.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 作用: Filter request by applying filters | 默认值: {}

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}

opportunityId.name: opportunityId
opportunityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Opportunity ID | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | (必填项)

noteId.name: noteId
noteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Note ID | (必填项)
